Lesson 5 - Getting the LED to change color based on an input, like pressing the "A" button.

Objective

In this lesson you will learn how to make the "A" button an input device that will signal the Linkbot's LED to change color from red to green.

#!/usr/bin/env python3 # Filename: Lesson05.py import linkbot import time import random import sys robot = linkbot.Linkbot() robot.setLedColor(255,0,0) #set the LED to red on "robot". def callback(button, event, timestamp): # defines a function "callback" print(button, event) if button == 1: global robot robot.setLedColor(0,255,0) robot.enableButtonEvents(callback) # Register the callback function with the # robot while True: time.sleep(1)

Explore

Make the Linkbot beep when the "A" button is depressed.
